name: Tally-Jo and the Huge Mistake
description:
Made by DeviousJinjo and Gatchaman with some help from TheBeigeKnight and Noisebeast for the May 2021 Goblin Bunker Game Jam.  Made in GB Studio.

Had lots of fun with it!

Exported to ROM version can be found here but I haven't tested it so uh, let me know if it works!
